description: Pamela Harris was accused of defrauding government agencies, including one scheme where she was said to falsely claim Hurricane Sandy relief.
title: Brooklyn Assemblywoman Indicted on Fraud Charges

description: At 452 years old, St. Augustine is no stranger to flooding. But damage from hurricanes in two consecutive years has left residents soaked, frustrated and worried about the future.
title: After Irma, a Grim Sense of Déjà Vu in St. Augustine

description: An eerily quiet week, at least by the standards of the 2016 election.
title: The Eye of the Trump Hurricane

description: President Trump said Puerto Ricans should be “proud” of the low death toll after Hurricane Maria. But a tour of the island by New York Times reporters showed that vast humanitarian and logistical challenges remain.
title: Amid Promises of Aid, a Puerto Rico Still in Ruins

description: A mural in a Bronx body shop portrays the island’s recovery efforts in a heroic light, likening its people’s resolve to the flag-raising at Iwo Jima.
title: Battered and Tattered, Puerto Rico’s Flag Still Waves

description: Officials upgraded Irma to a Category 4 hurricane early Sunday, reporting maximum sustained winds of 130 miles per hour.
title: Storm Gains Strength as It Nears Florida

description: In coastal states, damage caused by hurricanes or named storms is often subject to a separate deductible.
title: With Hurricane Season Here, Time to Check Home Insurance

description: Hurricane Irma has weakened to a tropical storm, but left damage to nearly all parts of a tightly connected Florida economy that relies heavily on tourism.

description: Some storm recovery advice for the afflicted of southeast Texas from New Yorkers who have unfortunately been there, unfortunately done this.

description: Necrotizing fasciitis, a deadly infection that destroys tissue, can be caused by a wide range of bacteria, many of which were present after Hurricane Harvey.

description: Politicians from both parties stressed urgency in passing relief legislation for areas of Texas and Louisiana hit by Hurricane Harvey.

description: It’s not going to be that bad, we say, until it’s too late.

description: Security footage outside Alice Melott’s and Jody Greenwood’s house in Wilmington, N.C., captures Hurricane Florence as it made landfall early on Friday, Sept. 14.

description: Thierry Sullivan, in Chocowinity, N.C., filmed the aftermath of Hurricane Florence on his town, where the streets were unrecognizable.

description: As she leads a nonprofit’s aid effort, Lymaris Albors channels the anguish stirred by Hurricane Maria into delivering help to her homeland.

description: In a series of tweets, the president accused the mayor of San Juan of “poor leadership” and implied that Puerto Rico should do more to help itself.

description: Driven from its home by Hurricane Harvey, Houston Grand Opera will use the city’s George R. Brown Convention Center to stage “La Traviata” and “Julius Caesar.”

description: In Utuado, one of the hardest hit towns in Puerto Rico, locals sent video messages to relatives abroad. The community has been without phone or internet connections since Hurricane Maria hit the island.
